channel.title: Tricky problem with webclient + pictures
channel.description:
I Correctly zipped my cache and know it downloads and unpacks cache perfect and client loads perfectly from client.jar file, but still when it's on website it doesn't work. :( Here's some pictures when i load from run.bat: It downloads cache: [img]http://img829.imageshack.us/img829/7214/34555638.jpg[/img] Unzips cache and loads everything... [img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/7609/15554392.jpg[/img] When i upload client.jar and add html file whitch loads jar file i see this first: [img]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/7992/24493368.jpg[/img] Then [img]http://img829.imageshack.us/img829/8518/71952267.jpg[/img] And then it repeats this: [img]http://img821.imageshack.us/img821/9949/75331694.jpg[/img] My html file with loads jar file looks like this: (it's not mine) [code] YOUR CLIENT

NOTE: YOUR SPECIAL NOTE HERE!!
Another note here.. [/code]

item.title: Tricky problem with webclient + pictures
item.dc:creator: @shadow43 shadow43
item.description:
@shadow43 wrote:

I find out my what was wrong. I just forgotted to make signed jar. If somebody has the same problem rick914 video shud help you.

Read full topic

item.title: Tricky problem with webclient + pictures
item.dc:creator: @dragonman2 dragonman2
item.description:
@dragonman2 wrote:

508s usually do that when the server is offline or the jsring isn’t right

Read full topic
